s1.message: This roadmap shows the high-level state of planning for Adblock Plus and related extensions. It is subject to constant change. A new version is generally being released when all features scheduled for it have been implemented and sufficiently tested in development builds.

s2.message: First-run page: Allow adding a privacy subscription

s3.message: Present users with a simpler user interface unless "advanced mode" is switched on

s4.message: Integrate Element Hiding Helper into Adblock Plus ("advanced mode" only)

s5.message: Filter Preferences: Allow selecting multiple subscriptions (for Update and Delete actions)

s6.message: Issue reporter: allow scrolling while selecting in the screnshot -- tentative

s7.message:
Simplify using Adblock Plus in "blacklist mode" (add "@@$document" via option and allow
    "Disable on ..." to modify it) -- tentative

s8.message: Preview for subscription being added -- tentative

s9.message: Better support for data: URL subscriptions -- tentative

s10.message: Support TLD wildcard for $domain option -- tentative

s12.message:
Blockable items improvements: item size for background images, preview for
    images loaded by Flash, file size

s13.message: Add UI to create exception rules with the new $elemhide option

s14.message: Don't open a new window when user is blocking from the list of blockable items, show filter composer there directly

s15.message: Thunderbird: Improve support for browser tabs

s20.message: Thunderbird: Allow restricting rules to mails from particular address or domain

s21.message: C++ implementation of core classes (via JSctypes) for better performance (current JavaScript implementation stays there as fallback)
